thread.title: A happy customer
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by A happy customer

author: A happy customer
title: A happy customer
text:
Ordered 3 blinds, all turned up as requested and look good.
Delivery was ahead of original date indicated and regular messages kept me updated on progress.
The need to download the fitting instructions may be an issue for some if you don't have a printer to hand - it would be good if a single sheet was included with the blinds to give the instructions on paper as it is a pain to try to fit with only the on line instructions to look at.
